headline: Baxter Announces Tender Offers for 2026 Notes and 2027 Notes
summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., November 19, 2025--Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX) ("Baxter" or the "Company") today announced the commencement of tender offers, subject to the terms and conditions described below, to purchase for cash the debt securities issued by Baxter listed in the table below (collectively, the "Securities" and each a "series"). Subject to market conditions, the tender offers are expected to be funded using a portion of the proceeds from a concurrent offering of senior unsecured note

raw.headline: Baxter Announces Tender Offers for 2026 Notes and 2027 Notes
raw.summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., November 19, 2025--Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX) ("Baxter" or the "Company") today announced the commencement of tender offers, subject to the terms and conditions described below, to purchase for cash the debt securities issued by Baxter listed in the table below (collectively, the "Securities" and each a "series"). Subject to market conditions, the tender offers are expected to be funded using a portion of the proceeds from a concurrent offering of senior unsecured note

headline: How Recent Developments Are Shaping the Evolving Story for Baxter International
summary: Baxter International’s stock narrative has seen an important update following the latest guidance and financial results. While analysts have maintained their consensus fair value per share at $24.07, the discount rate used in valuation models has risen slightly, from 9.73% to 10.00%. This change reflects a modest increase in perceived risk or cost of capital. Stay tuned to discover how investors can best keep up with evolving perspectives on Baxter’s value drivers and outlook. Analyst Price...
